title: 417 Beautiful West Facing Home, With Views Of The Space Needle!
posting_body: South Lake Union's up and coming neighborhood is within walking distance to Amazon, Microsoft Connector, Facebook and more!

Our unique building amenities include: Gear/Cycle/Kayak Storage Lockers, 2 Kayaks & 4 Stand up Paddle Boards Available for Free Rental, Back40 Partnership, Controlled Access Garage Parking, Resident Gaming Lounge (Free Wifi), Indoor Resident Lounge (Free Wifi), 4 Incredible Outdoor Rooftop Decks, Pups Peak (24hr 400+ sq.
ft. rooftop dog run), Amazon HUB Lockers and multi-provider internet ready!
Copy and Paste this link to view our screening criteria:
Close to Gates Foundation, 2 blocks away from Lake Union park and MOHI, 24/7 fitness center w/ rock wall, & monthly resident events!
This unit requires a $300 holding deposit.
An additional $200 is required upon approval and before move-in to create your refundable full $500 security deposit.
Pricing is set based on lease start date.
Visit our website for daily listed pricing.
•	Stainless Steel-High Energy Efficient Whirlpool Appliances
•	Soft Close Drawers & Cabinets w/ Adjustable Shelving
•	Energy Efficient LED Bulbs (We provide free change of burnt out bulbs)
•	German Handled (vent from top and from side; Most All Units)
•	USB Port Outlets (Living space and bedrooms)
•	Retractable Sprayer Kitchen Faucet w/ Stainless Steel Sink & ¼ Horse Power Garbage Disposal
•	Front-Loading Full-Sized Washer and Dryer (fits up to 18 pairs of denim!)
•	5 Burner Glass Top Ovens This apartment requires a $500 deposit.
True North, managed by Holland Residential
Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.
